div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 233 Thebes, Boeotia, 1965 Burial: c. 168 B.C. Contents: 16 AR, 42 AE. From excavations Thebes: 1 triob. Boeotia: 42 AE (many over Antigonus Doson) Histiaea: 2 tetrob. Achaean League: 2 triob. Sicyon: 1 triob. Megalopolis: 1 triob. Rhodes: 5 dr. Imit Rhodes: 3 dr. Roman Rep.: 1 den. Disposition: Thebes Hackens, BCH 1969, pp. 712-29, illus.
